dict.acceptation: 主意，想法；[哲]理念，观念；[乐]乐句；模糊想法；

sent.orig: IDEA is a symmetrical block cipher. End-to-end encryption based on IDEA is presented and analyzed.
sent.trans: 分析了基于分组密码算法IDEA设计的端-端加密系统。

sent.orig: Another popular secret-key cryptosystem is the International Data Encryption Algorithm (IDEA).
sent.trans: 另一个流行的秘密密钥加密系统是国际数据加密算法(IDEA)。

sent.orig: IDEA works on 64 bit data blocks with a 128 bit key.
sent.trans: IDEA用128位密钥处理64位数据块。

sent.orig: Base on priority and development plan, follow up IDEA implementation.
sent.trans: 按照优先顺序和开发计划，跟踪IDEA的实施情况。

sent.orig: IDEA is licensed by Ascom Systec in Switzerland, and is not affected by U.S. export restrictions.
sent.trans: idea由瑞士的AscomSystec公司授予许可证，它不受美国出口限制的影响。
